body_html:
XLA CPU does not currently support send/recv instructions

Could you elaborate on that? I see XLA send/recv in tensorflow/compiler/tf2xla/ops/sendrecv_ops.cc. Is cross-device XLA send/recv not supported? If so, when is it planned to be supported?
body_text:
XLA CPU does not currently support send/recv instructions

Could you elaborate on that? I see XLA send/recv in tensorflow/compiler/tf2xla/ops/sendrecv_ops.cc. Is cross-device XLA send/recv not supported? If so, when is it planned to be supported?
body:
> XLA CPU does not currently support send/recv instructions

Could you elaborate on that? I see XLA send/recv in tensorflow/compiler/tf2xla/ops/sendrecv_ops.cc. Is cross-device XLA send/recv not supported? If so, when is it planned to be supported?
